projectList.name: Barrick Innovate Hackathon
projectList.description: An Ethereum blockchain oriented solution to some of the difficulties of dealing with artisanal and small-scale mining (ASM) in developing countries such as illegal mining, slavery, child labour, heated conflict over land ownership. We provide a service that aims to create a community for ASM to work safely and in a stable environment. Through our system ASM will have the opportunity to inform Barrick of a potential opportunity via a picture containing geographic location. If it is indeed an opportunity, Barrick will be in a position to fund and employ said ASM once training and vetting requirement are satisfied.

projectList.name: Be Skatin'
projectList.description: Be Skatin' is an inline skating club that aims to teach beginners and intermediate skaters the ins and outs of skating in the streets of London.
